text: Lucina leucocyma, or the saw-toothed pen shell, is a species of bivalve mollusc in the family Lucinidae. It can be found along the Atlantic coast of North America, ranging from North Carolina to the West Indies.Abbott, R.T. & Morris, P.A. A Field Guide to Shells: Atlantic and Gulf Coasts and the West Indies. New York: Houghton Mifflin, 1995. 48. ==References== Category:Lucinidae Category:Molluscs described in 1886
title: Lucina leucocyma
